sentences.en: Clear your face: you shan't scowl at me!
sentences.cn: 脸色开朗些,你不必对我皱眉头!

sentences.en: Compare smirk, sneer, frown, scowl and grimace.
sentences.cn: 试比较smirk 、 sneer 、 frown 、 scowl、grimace这几个词.

sentences.en: He came insolently towards Mr. Won, his features set in a scowl.
sentences.cn: 他傲慢无礼地朝元先生冲过来，面露怒容。

sentences.en: He let his face resume a scowl.
sentences.cn: 他板起面孔,显出生气的样子.

sentences.en: He looked up at me with a scowl.
sentences.cn: 他脸色阴沉，抬眼看了看我。

sentences.en: He wore a permanent scowl on his face.
His long dumpy face wrinkled in a scowl.
sentences.cn: 那长下巴的胖圆脸皱起了眉头.

sentences.en: His scowl broke into an angry grin as he caught his sister's eye.
sentences.cn: 他和姊姊视线相接,他愁眉不展的脸忍不住变成悻悻的笑容.

sentences.en: I wonder why he is wearing an angry scowl.
sentences.cn: 我不知道他为何面带怒容.

sentences.en: Jon screwed his features into a scowl.
sentences.cn: 乔恩的眼睛鼻子挤成一付苦相.

sentences.en: Patrick scowled, but did as he was told.
sentences.cn: 帕特里克一脸不悦，但还是照办了。

sentences.en: She answered my smile with a scowl.
sentences.cn: 她以怒视回报我的微笑.

sentences.en: The boss manifested his disgust with a scowl.
sentences.cn: 老板面带怒色,清楚表示出他的厌恶之感.

sentences.en: The frown on the bachelor's face was deepening to a scowl.
sentences.cn: 独身男人的眉头皱得更紧了.

sentences.en: Their inability to scowl seemed to impair their ability to see why pushy telemarketers or a lack of birthday wishes might make one's face fall.
sentences.cn: 无法生气地皱眉似乎让他们不能很好地理解为什么咄咄逼人的电话销售或是没得到生日祝愿会让人沉下脸来。

sentences.en: Wear s amile and have friends. Wear a scowl and have wrinkles.
sentences.cn: 面带微笑,拥有朋友. 面带愁容,拥有皱纹.

sentences.en: Wears a mile and have friends a scowl and wrinkles.
sentences.cn: 面带微笑,拥囿朋友.面带愁容,拥囿皱纹.

words.tran_cn: 愁容；怒容；阴沉沉的样子

trans.tran_en: an angry or disapproving expression on someone’s face
to look at someone in an angry way
